label.h3: What does the green dot next to the name of a disaggregation indicate?

choicegroup.choice: The disaggregation has been added to the visualization
The disaggregation is not recommended for data analysis
The disaggregation is compatible with the data items in the visualization

div.p: If there is a green dot next to the name of a disaggregation it means the disaggregation is compatible with the data items currently in the visualization.
